1: A psalm by David. Lord, who may be a guest in your tent? Who may dwell on your holy mountain?
2: One who walks with integrity, who does what is righteous, and who speaks the truth in his heart.
3: He has no slander on his tongue. He does not harm his friend, and he does not defame his neighbor.
4: He despises everyone whom God rejects, but he honors those who fear the Lord. When he promises something, he does not break his word even though it costs him a lot.
5: He does not lend his money to get interest,[a] and he does not accept a bribe against the innocent. One who does these things will never be toppled.
